*Please fill out the following, removing all italicized text in the process.*

**Description**
*Please add a brief description of what the ticket is about (e.g. implementing a new feature, fixing an issue, ...).*

**Scope of Work**
*Please add the main points you want to address in this ticket in the list below.*
- *implement ABC*
- *test ABC*
- *...*

**Estimated Time**
*Just give your best estimate on how long you think completing this ticket will take.*
1h/d/wk (Done until: DD.MM.YYYY)
